format_ts.hpp File Reference

Include dependency graph for format_ts.hpp:

Namespaces

namespace  boost
namespace  boost::logging

Detailed Description

Include this file when you're using formatters and destinations, and you want to define the logger classes, in a source file (using BOOST_DEFINE_LOG) and you've decided to use some form of thread-safety
